name: changelogx
description: Yet another changelog generator from git commits, based on conventions and with an optional hook to enforce the rules

scripts.eslint: eslint --format 'node_modules/eslint-friendly-formatter' index.js lib/ bin/ src/ specs/ hooks/ -c './configs/eslint.json'
scripts.watch: npm run cover && watch-spawn -p 'specs/**/*.js' -p 'index.js' -p 'src/**/*.js' npm run cover
scripts.check: npm run beautify && npm run eslint && npm test
scripts.prepush: npm run beautify-check && npm run eslint && npm test

author: Roy Riojas (http://royriojas.com)
